website_summaries.verdict: If you want a sturdy, easy-to-use keyboard accessory that looks nearly as good as the iPad itself, the Belkin Qode Thin Type is one of the best.
pros: The Belkin Qode Thin Type Keyboard Case has a sturdy aluminum design, autopairs via Bluetooth once an iPad is dropped in, and has a lot of iOS-specific shortcut keys
cons: rear end is a little thicker than you'd expect for a thin keyboard
keys good but not the best for responsiveness

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard for iPad Air.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best keyboard for my iPad Air. I tried a few and I would give this one the highest rating. This is actually my second Belkin QODE Thin Type Keyboard Case for iPad Air, I bought it, just because I didn’t want to be without one for my iPad Air. I have had the experience in the past of another brand to stop working. I really didn’t need to buy this second one...as the first one was working fine after a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: InnateArtist

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to maintain Bluetooth contact with iPad
customer_reviews.text: In and of itself, this is a nice keyboard and I like how it protects my iPad. As others have noted, however, you must be working on a flat surface for the iPad to contact the keyboard correctly to make the Bluetooth connection. Also, it arrived in its box barely protected in a lightly padded envelope. I was frankly prepared for it to be broken. I like it enough to keep it: it's attractive, sturdy and easy to type on, but the connectivity issue is something prospective buyers should be aware of. And consider purchasing from another vendor who will package it well for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: M. Church

customer_reviews.title: It just works.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to replace a device with similar functionality because I found the keyboard bad. Frankly, I'm not sure a person has much use for a keyboard with an iPad but when you do, it's nice to have a good one. Other features are an ability to put the iPad in apps display mode (my term) where you can horizontally scroll through your open apps and close apps you're not using. It almost invariably pairs (it's a Bluetooth device) right nearly right away. For those that use the Remote utility from Apple, it did not interfere and interfaced correctly.
customer_reviews.author: JazzLover7

customer_reviews.title: ... for about 8 months while at work and I love it. It matches the fit and finish of ...
customer_reviews.text: Follow-up comment: After a year, the keyboard does not turn on when placing the iPad in the slot. Very disappointing I have used this keyboard for about 8 months while at work and I love it. It matches the fit and finish of the iPad Air. It has an auto-on switch when you mount the iPad in its slot but it has a tendency to jar loose while typing occasionally. I'd prefer turning it on and off manually. .
customer_reviews.author: Rocco T

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is excellent! Magnetic strip holds very well to the ipad
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is excellent! Magnetic strip holds very well to the ipad, stand only offers 1 angle, however that worked fine for me. I agree with a lot of other reviews about some of the keys being in the wrong spots. Only complaint is that after using this for a few weeks it made me realize how much I CAN'T do with my ipad, but that's obviously not a knock at this product.
customer_reviews.author: cincyshirm61

customer_reviews.title: Where is the semicolon?
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself is pretty decent (bar the occasional Bluetooth timeouts. The mechanics work quite well. So why only 3 stars? The key for the semicolon (; and :) is to the right of the space bar. This fails every time! I'm pretty close to switching keyboards just for that reason. Why oh why did you do this, Belkin!
customer_reviews.author: A. Smola

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are in Chinese with drawings of assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to pair this with my Ipad Air as was described in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: D R Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: this keypad works pretty good and is made very well
customer_reviews.text: this keypad works pretty good and is made very well, I just would not call it that slim or small and adds some weight so person buying it might want to keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: A. Coraccio

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard. It's held up nicely Since we've bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Keyboard. It's held up nicely Since we've bought it. We've had no problems with the keys or the Bluetooth pairing. Its sturdy, durable and reliable. My wife works on her iPad just like laptop now. I would most certainly buy again if we ever needed a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: ... bluetooth very well (cuts in and out) and is pretty heavy. Spend the extra money and get the ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stay connected by bluetooth very well (cuts in and out) and is pretty heavy. Spend the extra money and get the Belkin qode ultimate pro version. Has better viewing angels, it's lighter and has a backlit keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: JamesRD

customer_reviews.title: Lots of things I like about this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Lots of things I like about this keyboard, BUT...I have to keep "reminding" it that it is attached. Never had to do that with my old Logitech keyboard. It often detaches in the middle of typing...very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda M.

customer_reviews.title: Feels good and works well
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Feels good and works well. I don't really use it as a cover but more as a bluetooth keyboard for my iPad Air. It's a slick keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Sido

customer_reviews.title: Best of the currently available choices for IiPad Air
customer_reviews.text: We tried the Logitech and the Zagg. We returned both of them due to quality and compatibility issues with the iPad Air, This Belkin QODE is the slimmest and best made of the bunch , it's the only one made of aluminum not plastic and has the slimmest profile to keep your wrists straighter when typing.
customer_reviews.author: John Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Functional keyboard of iPad
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Typing in it takes getting used to, but now I am able to carry around my iPad instead of my laptop, typing away when needed. The construction is sturdy, but it does detach from the iPad rather easily. I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Russell

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth power switch not stable
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth power switch isn't stable. Disconnects very often. Then I have to lift the iPad and set it down again to reactivate.
customer_reviews.author: zwp

customer_reviews.title: Overall a really great keyboard, looks great with my space grey iPad
customer_reviews.text: Overall a really great keyboard, looks great with my space grey iPad. The feel keyboard is nice, feels solid. Good bang for the buck. The price got lower after i bought it, which was annoying. But other then that i was pleasantly surprised my the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E Angel

customer_reviews.title: Back to the drawing board
customer_reviews.text: The device feels like it is not yet finished. There are no magnets to keep it closed, so it opens when it isn't supposed to. The central strip also isn't magnetized so the iPad never "locks" into position, and never feels secure. The balance shut off feature works too well, so unless you are sitting at a desk, the keypad shuts off ALL the time. The size is OK, but not as small as the marketing literature would have you believe. I read some of the other reviews - the one thing this does not feel like in any way shape or form, is an Apple made product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kelly

customer_reviews.title: works great with my iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made. The magnetic clasp doesn't really do anything, but I don't think I would use it even if it did. I'm very impressed with the reaction time between my iPad air and this keyboard. The keyboard is very easy to use and is always dependable. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a slim keyboard for their iPad.
customer_reviews.author: BYUIgirl

customer_reviews.title: Boost your productivity
customer_reviews.text: This is a real boost for productivity. Love the ease of use and the battery life. I rarely use my iPad without it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful unit. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful unit. Easy to use. Very strong, though light. Good key feel and movement. Some keys are not in the usual, conventional, location, but I quickly adapted. Highly recommended. Switched to thus after using the Logitech unit which I found too fragile in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: George E. Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish the connection for typing configuration was also magnetized. Otherwise it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard, bad protector
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a case for my iPad Air that protects it and also includes a lightweight keyboard. This is a great keyboard (although NOT lightweight). It paired easily, had good tactical sense and performed as-advertised. The magnetic coupling to the iPad when closed is not strong enough to hold the (heavy) keyboard in place, so it constantly falls-off. You cannot use the iPad in portrait mode without taking the keyboard off or the two items fall-apart. There is virtually no way to use the camera without detaching the "case". Since the "case" detaches so easily from the iPad it provides no protection. I have returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Cigano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy all metal functional piece that goes so ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy all metal functional piece that goes so well with the iPad Air look & feel but only if it had backlit keyboard I would have rated it 5.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard; weird key placement (not the same as picture!)
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is very nice indeed. Allows you to use the iPad as it's intended OR with a keyboard in landscape OR portrait mode! Biggest issue is keysize (much smaller than regular keyboard) and the semicolon and apostrophe key are not how they are in the pictures in this listing. They are swapped around. Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: The best keyboard case for the iPad Air, hands down
customer_reviews.author: SteveMiller_PHX

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard is great with lots of room due to the reordering of ...
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is great with lots of room due to the reordering of key placement. I would recommend this if you plan on using it on a table, it does not work well on your lap because Bluetooth connectivity required the iPad to be firmly seated on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Keyboard Layout is Better.
customer_reviews.text: Well built and solid feel but the Logitech keyboard layout is better. I'm constantly correcting on the Belkin.
customer_reviews.author: DWT

customer_reviews.title: Worked out just fine. I was hoping that since it worked with ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked out just fine. I was hoping that since it worked with the ipad air that it would also connect up with an iphone 5C. But it didn't even fit the grooves nor connect up with the iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon L Fung

customer_reviews.title: great product fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: this item was used but works an look great also shipped in a very timely manner!!
customer_reviews.author: flavio rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient -- works great. Size close to full size key board.
customer_reviews.author: Lee E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. Light weight and very cleaver design.
customer_reviews.author: Willi

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to an IPaf
customer_reviews.text: Work great. No IPad should be without one. Makes a laptop or stand alonw tablet. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Corsairprime

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Nice look, great keyboard, really helps to speed up typing. If you always use iPad for typing, you must have this. Disadvantage: 1. It's a little heavier than I expected. 2. Can't use it without inserting iPad into the slot.
customer_reviews.author: Quake

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Its automated so i dont need to charge every day. I charged every week and it never died
customer_reviews.author: ilwoo jeong

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet keyboard with great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sweet keyboard with great battery life. Not great for Dvorak typists, unfortunately. The hardware layout isn't exactly correct, so you'll want to stick with QWERTY.
customer_reviews.author: JJJ

customer_reviews.title: perfect as I want
customer_reviews.text: perfect as I want. No damage on product and the same as the seller explained. You should trust this seller. Super satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Heetae Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipment and exactly what I was looking for. Great product and I was very happy with the ease that it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used, and it looks brand new. It makes keyboarding on the iPad so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great And pretty goods
customer_reviews.text: good products, great view when combined with iPad air. The wireless' performance is very good in using. anyway,I like it
customer_reviews.author: Newman Chen

customer_reviews.title: The Very Best!
customer_reviews.text: The best Case/Keyboard for iPad Air, much better than Logitech Thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Carlos Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard but Not a Standard Layout
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes for this keyboard. My Logitech keyboard doesn't have the greatest battery life and I sometimes forget to turn it off. This Belkin keyboard solves both of these problems. Unfortunately, the Belkin keyboard uses a slightly different layout for the punctuation keys than other keyboards (including the Logitech). The benefit of this design is that it makes the important keys of the keyboard big and easy to find. This is perfect for 99% of users, but for DVORAK keyboard users like me, it makes it utterly useless because essential keys like the 's' key get moved to really weird locations. I can't even find where the 'z' key gets moved to.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: amazing - better than my brydge for the prev ipad !
customer_reviews.author: Piet delport

product_meta.title: Belkin QODE Thin Type Keyboard Case for iPad Air (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:White

The Belkin QODE Thin Type Keyboard Cover is a combination keyboard/iPad cover with an exceptionally thin, minimalist design that travels well. Well-spaced keys provide faster, more accurate typing than your iPad Air's touchscreen, making the keyboard ideal for word processing and emailing. Smart sensing technology automatically turns the keyboard on when you need it and off when you don't. The keyboard connects to your iPad Air wirelessly through Bluetooth and has a long battery life. 

Designed to support a comfortable 35-degree-angle working position; simply snap your iPad Air into the hinge.
View larger

Keyboard's automatic on/off switch responds to the iPad Air's weight--for best results, use it on a stable surface. 
View larger

WELL-SPACED KEYPAD FOR FAST, ACCURATE TYPING
This laptop-style keyboard is made with well-spaced TruType keys that promote typing accuracy. A spring mechanism under each key provides a tactile response with every stroke, letting you type quickly and with fewer errors as you draft emails, write papers, or chat online. Shortcut keys make it easy to copy and paste text, adjust volume, or control music.

STYLISH, MINIMALIST DESIGN
Made with anodized aluminum, this cover's slim shape provides a snug fit for your iPad Air without adding bulk. Snap your iPad Air into the hinge, and magnets hold it securely in place, making it easy to slip it into your bag and go.

COMFORTABLE 35-DEGREE VIEWING ANGLE
A slot in the cover holds your iPad Air at a 35 degree angle--a comfortable working position--and accommodates both portrait and landscape orientations.

UP TO 79 HOURS OF TYPING BETWEEN CHARGES
To use the keyboard with your iPad Air, simply switch on the keyboard, pair it with your iPad Air, and the two will connect via Bluetooth. The battery lasts for 79 hours of active use and 3,100 hours of standby. You can easily recharge the battery using the included USB cable. 

AUTOMATIC ON/OFF SWITCH
The Belkin QODE Thin Type Keyboard Cover comes equipped with an automatic on/off switch that is activated by your iPad Air's weight. It's best to use the Thin Type on a hard, steady surface to ensure it performs as designed. If the Thin Type Keyboard is on your lap and isn't responding, please make sure the iPad Air is centered correctly and the keyboard will reactivate.

COMPATIBILITY INFORMATION
The Belkin QODE Thin Type Keyboard Cover is compatible with the iPad Air.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Belkin QODE Thin Type Keyboard Cover, USB charger cable, and user manual.

QODE THIN TYPE KEYBOARD COVER
AT A GLANCE:
 * Laptop-style keyboard with well-spaced, responsive keys
 * Anodized aluminum exterior protects iPad Air's screen
 * Minimalist, lightweight design for easy portability
 * Smart sensing technology automatically turns keyboard on and off
 * Accommodates both portrait and landscape orientation

Large, well-spaced keys promote typing accuracy and speed.
View larger

Battery provides up to 79 hours of active use between charges.

Smart sensing technology automatically turns the keyboard on when you need it and off when you don't.

Measures less than 4 millimeters for exceptionally thin protection for your iPad Air.
feature_bullets: Anodized aluminum unibody cover. Extremely thin design for easy portability
Equipped with an automatic on/off switch that is activated by your iPad Air's weight. It's best to use the Thin Type on a hard, steady surface
Laptop-style keyboard with responsive TruType keys
Comfortable viewing angle in portrait or landscape mode
Pairs with New iPad through Bluetooth
79 hours active battery life; 3,100 hours standby
Shortcut keys offer quick access to iPad Air controls
